title: Cyberpunk Heist Adventure #32
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Corporate Server Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit room filled with rows of humming servers, their LED indicators blinking in rhythmic patterns. Cables snake across the floor like digital veins. The air is cool and sterile, maintained by industrial air conditioning units. Holographic displays flicker on the walls showing system diagnostics. The faint smell of ozone and electronics fills the space.

items.name: server rack alpha
items.description: A tall rack of blade servers with a maintenance panel on the side

items.name: maintenance tablet
items.description: A digital tablet with system logs and maintenance records
items.text: MAINTENANCE LOG: NeoTech Corporation Server Farm - Established 2077. System Administrator: Marcus Chen. Lead Security Officer: Sarah Reeves. All critical data stored in Executive Vault on Level 3. Access requires proper authorization.

items.name: technician workstation
items.description: A desk cluttered with tools, cables, and a locked drawer unit

items.name: security memorandum
items.description: An official memo from corporate security
items.text: SECURITY MEMO: All personnel must use proper access credentials. Blue keycards grant access to Security Control. The vault combination is the founding year - 2077. Remember: only authorized personnel may access the data vault.

items.name: blue security keycard
items.description: A keycard with 'SECURITY CONTROL ACCESS' printed on it

items.name: network terminal
items.description: A glowing terminal displaying system information
items.text: SYSTEM STATUS: NeoTech Corp Network Online. Administrator: Marcus Chen. All vault access controlled by Security Officer Reeves. Critical files located in Executive Vault. Backup systems operational.

items.name: equipment locker
items.description: A metal locker containing technical equipment

items.name: industrial wire cutters
items.description: Heavy-duty cutters that could bypass certain locks

items.name: reinforced security door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader and biometric scanner, leading to Security Control

rooms.name: Security Control Center
rooms.description: A high-tech command center with wall-to-wall monitors displaying security camera feeds from throughout the building. Holographic displays show real-time threat assessments. The main console pulses with blue light. Emergency lighting casts everything in a cool glow. A massive vault door dominates the east wall.

items.name: security console
items.description: The primary control station with multiple screens and input terminals
items.text: SECURITY SYSTEM: NeoTech Corporation - All access logged. Current Security Officer: Sarah Reeves. System Administrator: Marcus Chen. Executive Vault contains classified corporate data. Vault access requires security clearance verification.

items.name: surveillance monitors
items.description: Dozens of screens showing camera feeds throughout the facility
items.text: Camera feeds show: Server Room (clear), Executive Offices (empty), Data Vault (secured). System timestamp: 2077 protocols active. All personnel movements tracked and logged by Security Control.

items.name: officer's desk
items.description: A desk with personnel files and a locked compartment

items.name: personnel records
items.description: Files containing employee information
items.text: PERSONNEL RECORDS: Sarah Reeves - Lead Security Officer, responsible for all vault access. Marcus Chen - System Administrator, maintains all corporate networks. Location: All classified data stored in Executive Vault on Level 3.

items.name: red executive keycard
items.description: A high-level keycard marked 'EXECUTIVE VAULT ACCESS'

items.name: security incident log
items.description: A digital log of security events
items.text: INCIDENT LOG: Multiple unauthorized access attempts detected. Security Officer Reeves has implemented additional vault protocols. Only personnel who can verify: Who controls vault access? Where is classified data stored? Who maintains the network?

items.name: tactical equipment rack
items.description: A rack containing security gear and tools

items.name: portable EMP device
items.description: A small electromagnetic pulse device for disabling electronics

items.name: executive vault door
items.description: A massive reinforced door with a biometric scanner and security verification system. Three security questions are displayed on the access panel.

password_questions.question: Who controls vault access?
password_questions.hint: Check the personnel records and security console information

password_questions.question: Where is classified data stored?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention the location of critical files

password_questions.question: Who maintains the network?
password_questions.hint: The maintenance tablet and personnel files identify the system administrator

rooms.name: Executive Data Vault
rooms.description: You've breached the Executive Vault! A pristine chamber with walls lined with data storage units and quantum servers. Holographic displays show streams of encrypted data. In the center, a pedestal holds the prize - a glowing data chip containing the corporation's most valuable secrets. An emergency exit hatch in the ceiling leads to freedom.

items.name: secure data pedestal
items.description: A cylindrical pedestal with a data chip under a protective field

items.name: encrypted data chip
items.description: The target of your heist - a chip containing billions in corporate secrets

items.name: quantum server array
items.description: Cutting-edge servers processing encrypted corporate data

items.name: holographic data display
items.description: A 3D display showing real-time data streams and security status

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've secured the data chip and completed the heist! As alarms begin to wail, you climb through the emergency hatch and escape into the neon-lit night of the city. The corporate secrets are yours, and you've pulled off the impossible. The streets below buzz with hovercars as you disappear into the urban sprawl. You win!
